info.title: Mortgage Calculator API
info.description: REST API for mortgage simulation using the French amortization method. Supports both fixed and variable interest rates, with complete simulation history and export functionality.

post.description: Create a new user account and receive an access token for API authentication.

message.example: O email é obrigatório (and 1 more error)

post.description: Authenticate with email and password to receive an access token.
Revoke the current access token. After logout, the token cannot be reused.

get.description: Retrieve the profile information of the currently authenticated user.

post.description: Calculate monthly mortgage payment using French amortization method. Supports both fixed and variable rates. The simulation is automatically saved to user's history.

duration_months.description: Loan duration in months (60-480, i.e., 5-40 years)

rate.description: Annual interest rate (required for fixed rate, 0-100%)

index_rate.description: Index rate like Euribor (required for variable rate, 0-100%)

message.example: O valor do empréstimo tem de ser pelo menos 5000€

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all simulations for the authenticated user, ordered by most recent first.
Get detailed information about a specific simulation, including the complete month-by-month amortization table.

403.description: Forbidden - Cannot access other user's simulation

get.description: Download the complete amortization table in CSV or Excel format. The file includes all monthly payments with principal, interest, and remaining balance.

error.example: Invalid format. Use csv or excel

get.description: Check if the API and its dependencies (database) are running and responsive. Returns detailed status for monitoring and alerting systems.

200.description: API and all dependencies are healthy

503.description: Service unavailable - one or more dependencies are down
